decision_conditions: The modifications hereby approved to reduce the size of the outbuilding as shown on the approved drawings listed in Condition 2 shall be completed within three (3) months from the date of this permission otherwise the planning permission will lapse.

Reason: In the interests of the character and visual appearance of the property and surrounding area, in accordance with Policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), Policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and Policy DAA of Ealing's draft new Local Plan (Regulation 18).

| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing numbers: TRICON/53TR/203 Issue A (Proposed Ground Floor Plan); TRICON/53TR/205 Issue A (As-built Elevations - Main Property); TRICON/53TR/207 Issue A (Proposed Elevations - Outbuilding); TRICON/53TR/208 Issue A (Pre-existing, As-built and Proposed Roof Plans); TRICON/53TR/211 Issue A (Proposed Site Plan).
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with Policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), Policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and Policy DAA of Ealing's draft new Local Plan (Regulation 18).
| No part of the flat roofs of the hereby approved development shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with Policies 7A and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) and Policy DAA of Ealing's draft new Local Plan (Regulation 18).

| The outbuilding hereby approved shall be used only for domestic purposes incidental to the dwellinghouse on this site, and shall not be used for separate habitable accommodation, letting or any commercial use. No cooking or kitchen facilities shall be installed at any time.

Reason: To ensure that the development does not detract from the amenity of the adjoining properties, and to enable the Local Planning Authority to retain control over the use of the building, in accordance with Policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), Policies D3, D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021) and the NPPF (2023).
description: Single storey rear/side (wrap around) extension; modifications to existing outbuilding (Works are Part Retrospective)
